title: Red lentil curry
ingredients: ['185g basmati rice', '1.7L water, divided', '180g red lentils, rinsed', '85g finely chopped red onion', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper (optional)', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne powder (optional)', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '100g broccoli florets', '180g diced tomatoes (optional)', '150g frozen peas (optional)', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed', '70g sliced mushrooms', '1 tablespoon peeled, finely grated fresh ginger', '2 cloves garlic, finely grated']
